divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking home from the library when I looked up, and saw an apparent severe meteor shower, as the sky was all streaked. I occasionally would look up at it when one time I did I saw a sphere high in the sky come down to the ground. It was about the size of a basketball, as it suddenly stopped and hovered a foot from the ground in a field across the street from me. It hovered for about 3 seconds then in one sweeping fast motion flew straight up, and out into space at a high speed. I do not know if there was any connection with the meteor shower and the sphere. Thank you.
Summary: A sighted sphere during an apparent meteor shower.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Garden Grove
There were no other sightings in Garden Grove on or around November 30th 1989
